title: The worst URF ever.
body:
so i can say with 100% certainly this round of urf has been the least fun FOR ME by far.

i can live with all random.
i can live this the full teams of broken comps.
i can live with that damn cannon.

but what i cant stand is that damn elder dragon. it legit gives like a 80% chance to win for whatever team that gets it.in fact its such a huge damage swing that its even worth giving up 4 towers and an inhibitor for.

honestly its not even a game just a race for dragon.and its unfun cause as soon as it spawns you are pretty much forced to gather around it and fight for it or get a riot enforced auto lose.

out of the 100 games or so iv looked at/played so far is allmost always pretty much gg at dragon according to the timeline graph the team that gets dragon will almost always go on snowballing the game till they end it at about 15-20 min.

has this been that case with everyone else? hell has anyone even gotten a game that lasted over 22min? dose anyone even like this riot enforced short game crap?cause i cant even seem to enjoy urf at all when the whole game revolves around getting a single dragon.
